item.title: Leetcode 19.Remove Nth Node From End of List
item.description: 題目敘述 Given the head of a linked list, remove the nth node from the end of the list and return its head. string convert(string s, int numRows); 測試資料 Example 1: Input: head = [1,2,3,4,5], n = 2 Output: [1,2,3,5] Example 2: Input: head = [1], n = 1 Output: [] Example 3: Input: head = [1,2], n = 1 Output: [1] 限制條件 The number of nodes in the list is sz.

item.title: Leetcode 6.Zigzag Conversion
